import React, {Component, useState } from 'react'; import {Navbar, NavbarBrand, Nav, NavbarToggler, Collapse, NavItem, Jumbotron, Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label} from 'reactstrap' // nav link auto maticly impliment the active component and a tag import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom'; import EditBox from './EditBoxComponent'; import {Tabs, Tab} from "react-bootstrap" ; const Header = (props) => { const [isNavOpen, setIsNavOpen] = useState(false); const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const [modalTab, setModalTab] = useState("login"); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [repassword, setRepassword] = useState(""); const [user, setUser] = useState(0); // setup console.log("HeaderComponent: render, content", props.content) var content = null; var title = "" if(props.content !== null){ console.log("HeaderComponent, if, content", props.content[0]) content = props.content[0] title = props.content[0].title } function handleLogin(event){ var error = ""; const userIndex = props.content.findIndex((user) => user.id === username); if(userIndex > 0){ if(props.content[userIndex].password === password){ setUser(userIndex) } else{ //wrong password error = "wrong password or user name" } } else{ //create new user? error = "user name not found\nyou can quickly creat new account in the sign up" } const fields = [username.value, password.value, props.content.title, props.content.titleFontSize, props.content.description , props.content.descriptionFontSize]; props.putContent(fields); setIsModalOpen(!isModalOpen); event.preventDefault(); } return(
setIsNavOpen(!isNavOpen)}/>
